DataSift::APIError

Thrown when an error is found in API responses. These errors optionally carry the HTTP error code.

Attributes

http_code[R]

The HTTP status code.

Public Class Methods

new(http_code = -1) click to toggle source

Constructor.

Parameters

  • http_code - Optional HTTP status code.

        @http_code = http_code
end
